about_the_game:
Candelaria travels from one funeral to the next, weeping for the departed she has never met in life, going on long night treks that keep her insomnia at bay.

When she comes across a bus ticket she did not buy to the mysterious Eigengrau Line, she is forced to confront traumas from the past and define a new course for her life.

ITINERARY


  • Get aboard a short, atmospheric story by Tiago Rech, award-winning author of TELEFORUM, Dodgeball Academia, No Place for Bravery, and Galaxy of Pen & Paper.
  • What is your destination? Find 5+ endings created by your choices.
  • Experience a unique, dark art style in 4K resolution.
  • Interact with bizarre passengers during a surreal journey.
  • Go to funerals, weep for the dead.
  • Find yourself amidst your traumas... or run away forever.

Candelaria travels from one funeral to the next, weeping for the departed she has never met in life, going on long night treks that keep her insomnia at bay.

When she comes across a bus ticket she did not buy to the mysterious Eigengrau Line, she is forced to confront traumas from the past and define a new course for her life.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: I Did Not Buy This Ticket Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Multi-core 1.6GHz or faster 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 11 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Weep for the dead! In this short psychological horror story, play as a professional mourner travelling between funerals. Ride a nightmarish bus whose destination depends on how you choose to face your traumas.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Hungarian, Korean, Russian
